'''2.17.13''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on February 7, 2024.

== Tweaks & improvements ==
* Java and Bedrock Quick Play are now available in the Launcher.
** Play a ''Java Edition'' or ''Bedrock Edition'' game world and a quick play icon for that world will automatically show up in the upper right corner of the game's page in the Launcher.
* Various UI & bug fixes to ensure dialogs show up correctly.

== Bug fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-24048}} - Launcher string used for ConfirmDeleteAllQuickPlayDialog contains a spelling mistake
* {{Bug|MCL-24049}} - Launcher string for deleting quick play entries contains a spelling mistake
